title.rendered: From Dubai To Russia And Ukraine With Love

content.rendered: Dubai: Two expats are hoping to take their message of love and peace from Dubai to Ukraine where attacks from Russia over the past week have left thousands dead and millions displaced.

excerpt.rendered:
Russian Aleksandra Vasileva and Ukrainian Yuliia Hnatenko walk hand in hand along Dubai’s Kite Beach wrapped in flags of both countries in a heartwarming video by top Dubai business setup firm A&A Associate.

Learn More
